archimate:BusinessProcess.name: MAN.3.BP10 Review and report progress of the project
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Regularly review and report the status of the project and the fulfillment of activities against estimated effort and duration to all affected parties. Prevent recurrence of problems identified. NOTE 11: Project reviews may be executed at regular intervals by the management. At the end of a project, a project review contributes to identifying e.g. best practices and lessons learned
